item.description:
Boston Ecademy combines offline events with the online networking at Ecademy Site to maximize your networking experience.

Please try to invite 1 or 2 friends to join us for this meeting. Our target attendance for this meeting is 15-20 people!

RSVP "Yes" or "Maybe" by 4:00PM of December 8th and the cost will be $5.00.

All others will be charged $10.00 at the door.

Proposed Agenda:
6:00 Introductions and Wine
6:20 Online/Offline Networking
6:40 Speed Networking
7:00 Mystery Speaker
7:20 Surprise Agenda Item
7:40 Building Boston Ecademy

PHT Corporation is located in Charlestown, Massachusetts in the Hood Business Park. There is free visitor parking available in front of the building. PHT is located on the 2nd Floor.



For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy December Meetup
